page.title: 20CHAPEL'FRITH AMENITY SOCIETY
page.content: The Society was formed in l976 to press the local authorities for the re-establishment of the town's weekly market.After its success the Society has developed & today it exists to improve the image of the town by seeking to promote a sense of civic pride & awareness of heritage.During the summer the Society organises guided walks about the town & the surrounding countryside.Winter activities include social events & illustrated talks on varied topics covering local history,architecture & natural history.Competitions to increase children's knowledge of the town are also arranged.In l985 the Society is promoting the facilities offered by the town's 40 or so recreational & sporting clubs. Contributed by M.D.Lister(Chairman).
